attributes.action: Force  Cabinet Ministers to Occupy Grace and Favour Accomodation as a condition of their Appointment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jackie SMITH could save the TAXPAYER 
( her employer) in excess of £200,000 
per annum by residing in the "Grace & Favour "accomodation that is available for the Home Secretary.
The fact that she chooses not to  "Stinks" of money grabbing & the familiar Gravy Train mentality of MP,s

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
